participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and engaging, she enjoys helping others find their paths.
participant_1.background: Samantha has a degree in psychology and has been a life coach for over 10 years, specializing in personal development.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and friendly, he loves exploring new ideas and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: Jake works in digital marketing and has a passion for food photography, often experimenting with new recipes.

content.text: Im a life coach.What is your job?
